thread.title: Vanessa Hudgens is effortlessly chic while shopping in LA
thread.title_full: Vanessa Hudgens is effortlessly chic while shopping in LA | Daily Mail Online

author: Stephanie Haney At Dailymail.com
title: Vanessa Hudgens is effortlessly chic while shopping in LA
text:
Vanessa Hudgens looked as cool as can be while she was out shopping for make-up in Los Angeles on Sunday.
Vanessa, 28, stopped at a Sephora store to pick up some essentials and round out her weekend, just days after the premiere of her new show, Powerless.
The Grease Live! performer sipped an icy beverage as she perused the aisles in search of her cosmetic needs.
Effortlessly chic: Vanessa Hudgens looked as cool as can be while she was out shopping for makeup in Los Angeles on Sunday
The Spring Breakers star wore an loose, grey turtleneck sweater with a bit of fringe at the end of the sleeves under a warm, leather bomber jacket with wool lining.
She wore tattered, roomy jeans in a medium denim wash that stopped just shy of her ankles and revealed her fancy footwear.
Her shows were glossy, patent leather slip-on loafers, featuring a backless design with black fur lining.
Running errands: Vanessa, 28, stopped at a Sephora store to pick up some essentials and round out her weekend
Comfy clothes: The Powerless star wore an loose, grey turtleneck sweater with a bit of fringe at the end of the sleeves under a warm, leather bomber jacket with wool lining
Keep cosy in Vanessa's Lovers + Friends X Revolve jumper £134.58 Lovers + Friends X Revolve Kate sweater
Get it now!
Buy now
Vanessa Hudgens was spotted enjoying some retail therapy over in LA this week, rocking a casual ensemble featuring a grey roll neck jumper teamed with ripped jeans and a black shearling collar biker jacket. She then accessorised her ensemble with black patent flats, a Louis Vuitton crossbody bag and some oversized aviators.
We're loving this off-duty look on Vanessa and are especially coveting her jumper which features lace up sleeves and a cosy roll neck.
Statement sleeves are a big look this season, with tie-details and frills featuring on the runways and now the high street.
We're loving the lace up detail on Vanessa's jumper which is from Lovers + Friends X Revolve and is available to buy online now by following the link on the right.
Or for more choice shop around with our edit of alternatives in the carousel below.

The High School Musical alum's rose colored nails were set off with just one, simple gold ring.
Vanessa's other accessories included oversized aviator sunglasses and large hoop earrings.
She slung a brown leather Louis Vuitton cross-body envelope satchel over her torso as she made her way around the store.
Edgy actor: She wore tattered, roomy jeans in a medium denim wash that stopped just shy of her ankles and revealed her fancy footwear
Funny lady: The Disney Channel actor has been busy as of late, filming her new television, Powerless, a DC Comics sitcom; Powerless airs Thursdays on NBC at 8.30pm Eastern
The Disney Channel actor has been busy as of late, filming her new television, Powerless, a DC Comics sitcom.
In this latest role she plays the character of Emily Locke, who is part of a team that works for Bruce Wayne's cousin developing devices that help guard average citizens against the fallout from superhero and villain battles.
Powerless airs Thursday nights on NBC at 8.30pm.
New gig: Powerless airs Thursday nights on NBC at 8.30pm
